annotations.description: A very refreshing cocktail making expert use of Absinthe The French Pearl was created by Audrey Saunders in 2006 for the Pegu Club in New York City. This dri...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: French Pearl

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
Absinthe Rinse (Approx. .25oz, 7.5ml) 
6-8 Mint Leaves
Mint Leaf Garnish

Muddle and shake with ice. Double strain into coupe. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OA7FWMVx9AY
title: French Pearl
